TextView.android:text: Yoga is an ancient practice that involves physical poses, concentration, and deep breathing. A regular yoga practice can promoteTrusted Source endurance, strength, calmness, flexibility, and well-being. Yoga is now a popular form of exercise around the world. According to a 2017 national surveyTrusted Source, one in seven adults in the United States practiced yoga in the past 12 months.

According to a 2012 surveyTrusted Source, 94% of adults who practice yoga do so for wellness reasons. Yoga has many physical and mental benefits: building muscle strength enhancing flexibility promoting better breathing supporting heart health helping with treatment for addiction reducing stress, anxiety, depression, and chronic pain improving sleep enhancing overall well-being and quality of life It is advisable to consult a medical professional, if possible, before starting a yoga practice.
